column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/ea30d7ae9c52722bd7d733cfaa4ab55cace8213f for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
I don't really like making checkpoints even more dependent on main. Ideally, it should be just some data with accessors, and even more ideally, be removed entirely.\n

IMO IsInitialBlockDownload shouldn't be in main either because it is not part of consensus.

Anyhow I thought from discussion in #3088 that this was pretty non-controversial.

Closing...
